Question
========

A person achieves a score of 7.3 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 3.9 with a standard deviation 2.6. The z-score of the person with 7.3 good is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.13
* 1.31
* 2.05

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.13: Incorrect
* 1.31: Correct
* 2.05: Incorrect
